## Texture.bindSync() method

If ready, binds the texture to `gl.TEXTURE_2D`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bindSync(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the texture has been successfully bound, `false` otherwise.
